info.name: Mastodon - Soft Warm Light
info.description: A full-width flat theme with warm non-pure-white-background and orange accents for Mastodon. The custom emoji isn't included in that skin but you can find it here
info.additionalInfo:
v1.7 : 

added a dashed left-border on direct toots so they are easier to spot

v 1.6 : 

edited a color bug that appeared with last version of Mastodon

v1.5 :

finally customized the scrollbar color (/!\ Firefox doesn't accept scrollbar skinning /!\)

v1.4 :

add a lot more instances on default code, so this theme should work for almost everyone ;)

v1.3 : 

finally edited the CSS for responsive part of Mastodon^^
coloured the loading bar

v1.2 :

changed the CSS to expand Mastodon full-width.

editer the color and drop shadow of column icons when clicked to match the theme

stylised the selected text to match the theme


*****************************

v. 1.1 : 

corrected the color of the "show more" "show less" buttons in boosted/favorited toot notifications

corrected the color of the autosuggested usernames (they were like darkgrey on black before -_-')

corrected the color of new follower's username in notifications column on hover (it was turning white which was unreadable obviously)
